Unique characters: Your team is formed of unique characters you pick up along the way. Each one of them brings their own story, skills and experiences to the journey.
Find yourself in the middle of an engrossing story-line. Step by step youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll uncover the mysterious events that took place and what it means for you and all of humanity.
